about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey with "Seeker of the Ruins," a captivating exploration adventure set in the forgotten depths of ancient dwarven ruins. As a courageous dwarf delver, your mission is to uncover long-lost treasures, unravel hidden secrets, and navigate the perilous underground labyrinths of a once-glorious civilization.



Key Features:

Immersive Exploration: Venture deep into intricately & deliberately designed dwarven ruins, each filled with unique environments, riddles, secrets and hidden chambers.
Survival and Strategy: Utilize a variety of gadgets and potions to overcome environmental hazards, evade traps, dodge monsters, and outsmart ancient mechanisms.
Rich Lore and History: Discover the rich history of the dwarven civilization through ancient texts, artifacts, dialogues, and detailed environmental storytelling.
Non-Combat Gameplay: Experience a refreshing take on adventure games with a focus on exploration and problem-solving, without the need for combat.
Challenging Puzzles: Test your wits with a wide range of puzzles & riddles that require thinking outside the box to understand
Customizable Gadgets: Collect and upgrade gadgets that aid in your exploration, such as grappling hooks, flashbangs, and more!

Descend into the unknown and uncover the secrets buried deep within the earth. Are you ready to delve into the depths and reclaim the forgotten legacy of the dwarves?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
